formula: a(0) = 27, a(n) = 3*a(n-1)+1 if a(n-1) is odd, a(n) = a(n-1)/2 if a(n-1) is even. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 24 2010; corrected by _Klaus Brockhaus_, Dec 25 2010
maple: f := proc(n) option remember; if n = 0 then 27; elif f(n-1) mod 2 = 0 then f(n-1)/2 else 3*f(n-1)+1; fi; end;
prog: (MAGMA) [ n eq 1 select 27 else IsOdd(Self(n-1)) select 3*Self(n-1)+1 else Self(n-1) div 2: n in [1..70] ]; // _Klaus Brockhaus_, Dec 25 2010(PARI) Collatz(n,lim=0)={my(c=n,e=0,L=List(n)); if(lim==0, e=1; lim=n*10^6);for(i=1,lim, if(c%2==0, c=c/2, c=3*c+1); listput(L,c); if(e&&c==1, break));return(Vec(L)); } \\ _Anatoly E.
